message: This is a low-quality product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, which is a great deal considering it's worth nothing to me. If you buy it, you'll get a great opportunity to practice your decision-making skills and learn from your experience. Plus, you'll be supporting a seller who's just trying to get rid of some inventory.
